articles.description: Hope Dickson Leach relocates RL Stevenson’s gothic chiller to its spiritual home in Edinburgh and gives it a modern format, but it’s a verbose, old-fashioned work
articles.content: Two years ago the idea would have been preposterous: why would anyone re-enact Robert Louis Stevensons novella in the dilapidated corridors and back rooms of Leith theatre while the audience watched … [+2015 chars]
